AD_PanicRoomComment.synopsis: The spirit in the amulet is commenting on the panic room in Ketheric City. It was near here that its occupant was tortured centuries ago.
AD_PanicRoomComment.how_to_trigger: Enter the panic room with the amulet equipped

AD_KethericCityComment.synopsis: The spirit in the amulet is commenting on the state of Ketheric City since he last saw it

AD_PanicRoomComment_0.speaker: GROUP_GLO_MonkAmulet_Spirit
AD_PanicRoomComment_0.text: HeHEE! Blood was once spilled here. My blood, no less. HahahaHA.
AD_PanicRoomComment_0.context: NodeContext: On the verge of madness as always.

AD_KethericCityComment_0.speaker: GROUP_GLO_MonkAmulet_Spirit
AD_KethericCityComment_0.text: Grymforge - naught born here but tragedy. HahaHEE!
AD_KethericCityComment_0.context: NodeContext: As always. spoken with a somewhat crazed laughter.
